```{r}
# 自然言語処理100本ノック
# 1
ch <- "stressed"
str_split("stressed", "")[[1]] %>% rev %>% as.list %>% do.call(paste0, .)
str_split("stressed", "")[[1]] %>% rev %>% paste(collapse="")
sapply(lapply(strsplit("stressed", NULL), rev), paste, collapse="")
```

```{r}
# 3
ch1 <- "パトカー"
ch2 <-"タクシ"
chmat <- matrix("", max(str_length(ch1), str_length(ch2)), 2)
chmat <- matrix(c(str_split(ch1, "")[[1]], str_split(ch2, "")[[1]]), max(str_length(ch1), str_length(ch2)))
ch <- t(chmat)
```
